content:
The pre-connectathon Risk Adjustment Track kickoff will be held today at 12pm ET during the regular Da Vinci Risk Adjustment community call. Here is the meeting information: https://global.gotomeeting.com/join/912257533

You can also dial in using your phone.
(For supported devices, tap a one-touch number below to join instantly.)

United States: +1 (646) 749-3122

  • One-touch: tel:+16467493122,,912257533#

Access Code: 912-257-533
